description: This file provides a function to generate lightweight preview models for presentation slides, mainly used for rendering HTML/CSS approximations in a preview UI.

methods.name: buildPreviewSlides({ template, content, theme, globalFirstSlide })
methods.description: Creates an array of slide preview models with layout and normalized content based on input template and data.

ctags.name: buildPreviewSlides
ctags.pattern: /^export function buildPreviewSlides({ template, content, theme, globalFirstSlide }) {$/
